availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James H. McGoodwin (Warren County grocery merchant)

body.p: Warren County, Kentucky, grocery merchant. Warren County native. Son of James K. and Cornelia McGoodwin. Married to Amanda Q. Loving in February 1858. Father of William Q. McGoodwin. Grocery merchant in Warren County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Warren County, District 2, p. 130A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Warren County, District 1, p. 852.
Kentucky, County Marriage Records, 1783-1965, Warren County, Bowling Green, February 3, 1858 (accessed via Ancestry.com).
